original_title: I'm "George Lucas": A Connor Ratliff Story
overview: Five years into performing as renowned filmmaker George Lucas in the NY cult comedy show "The George Lucas Talk Show", comedian Connor Ratliff questions the need for its continuation and his own drive for success and fulfillment in show business.
tagline: Connor Ratliff's nine-year journey into the mind of filmmaker George Lucas.
title: I'm "George Lucas": A Connor Ratliff Story
